Params
utm_source=firefox
utm_medium=heartbeat (or whatever the action name is - recommendation, shield study, etc)
utm_campaign=shortenedmesssagetext (just a shortened version of whatever is in the message field. It does need to be unique so we can tell them apart.)

Example link https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/new/?utm_source=firefox&utm_medium=heartbeat&utm_campaign=shortenedmesssagetext

That work?
